heading: Thursday Night
text: Partly cloudy in southeastern valleys, otherwise mostly cloudy. Scattered to numerous snow showers north, with a trace to 2 inches, except 3 to 6 inches in the advisory areas. Lows in the single digits to around 10 above in the north, low to mid teens in the south. West winds 10 to 15 mph, gusting to 30 mph.

heading: Friday
text: Mostly sunny, except clouds gradually decreasing northeast, with some mountain snow showers there, mainly in the morning. Highs from the upper teens to mid 20s, except far southern valleys in the mid to upper 20s. West winds 5 to 15 mph, gusting to 30 mph in the morning.

heading: Friday Night
text: Periods of clouds. Lows from the single digits to mid teens. Winds becoming light, variable to south.
